description: This file contains unit tests for the NotificationsService, specifically testing the 'getNotifications' method using the Flutter test framework and mocktail for mocking dependencies.

classes.name: MockDio
classes.description: A mock implementation of the Dio HTTP client used for testing network calls.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The test suite entry point that sets up the testing environment and contains test groups.

methods.name: setUpAll
methods.description: Initializes the test environment before all tests run.

methods.name: setUp
methods.description: Initializes a new MockDio instance before each test.
